instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2289: What is A2289? A2289 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2020 with EMC 3456, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01987..
definitions.820-01987: What is 820-01987? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01987</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> webcam not working
threads.message:
Logic board had spillage around <CAPACITOR>C6907</CAPACITOR> . L850 was burned so replaced it and <CHIP>U8500</CHIP> as no <SIGNAL>PP5V_G3S_ALSCAM</SIGNAL>. Now getting <SIGNAL>PP5V_G3S_ALSCAM</SIGNAL> and present on J8500.
I have tried 2 different screen assemblies both webcam not present. I have also checked L8503 and L8502 both read .223 diode reading.
<CHIP>U8502</CHIP> was replaced but still same.
Any help appreciated.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01987</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> webcam not working
threads.message:
Did you check continuity for L8502/03?
<CHIP>U8502</CHIP> nreceives enable signal at pin 11?

ALS works at least?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01987</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> webcam not working
threads.message:
Hi yes continuity on both L8502/L8503 . These should read about .5 diode reading but they read .223 .
<CHIP>U8502</CHIP> enable pin 11
Can I measure this with board out or does webcam need to be connected.

How to check ALS?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01987</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> webcam not working
threads.message:
You should check enable signal with camera connected.
Get video cable extension from Aliexpress; cheap enough, need 2!

Direct flashlight to webcam and check if LCD and keyboard backlight react.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01987</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> webcam not working
threads.message: I should have a few here will try it. Thank you for your help.
